definition: toy figurine/action figure/stuffed animal/doll/(fig.) sb's plaything
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
Doll's House (1879), drama by Ibsen 易卜生

sentences.chinese: 玩偶匣的弹簧昨天坏了。

sentences.english: He unpacked the doll carefully from its box.
sentences.chinese: 他小心地将玩偶从盒中取出来。

sentences.english: The dolls thus arrayed all wear the sumptuous court garb of the Heian period.
sentences.chinese: 所有的玩偶皆身穿平安时代奢华的法官服装。

sentences.english: He began carving out his career in miniatures after making furniture for his daughter's doll's house.
sentences.chinese: 他是在为女儿制作玩偶之家后开始微雕事业的。

sentences.english: My birthday presents included a doll and a Winnie-the-Pooh balloon.
sentences.chinese: 我的生日礼物有一只玩偶和一只维尼小熊的气球。

sentences.english: She now has two new toys today. FML
sentences.chinese: 她今天已经这样获得了两个新玩偶了。

sentences.english: The spiritual connections with doll-like figures reach well back into Japan’s prehistory.
sentences.chinese: 玩偶般的人物的精神联系可以追溯到日本的史前史。

sentences.english: Old coats could be converted into stuffed animals.
sentences.chinese: 旧大衣可以转变成填充动物玩偶。

sentences.english: “The Japanese believe, ” Oshii has said, “that dolls have a spirit.”
sentences.chinese: 押井说，“日本人认为，玩偶有一种精神。”

sentences.english: Many grandparents buy a set of dolls for their first granddaughter.
sentences.chinese: 许多祖父母为他们的第一个孙女购买郑涛的玩偶。

sentences.english: Have you been watching all your former costars on Dollhouse?
sentences.chinese: 您一直关注所有以前在《玩偶特工》的合作演员？

sentences.english: Her bedroom is lined from floor to ceiling with clothes and dolls.
sentences.chinese: 她的卧室里，从地板到屋顶摆满了衣服和玩偶。

sentences.english: Sometimes up to 30 dolls can be combined inside the biggest doll.
sentences.chinese: 有时多达30个玩偶都能被逐一套入最大的玩偶里。

sentences.english: Sometimes up to 30 dolls can be combined inside the biggest doll.
sentences.chinese: 有时多达30个玩偶都能被逐一套入最大的玩偶里。

sentences.english: In a male- centred world, they serve as the doll.
sentences.chinese: 在男权世界中，她们充当的是满足欲望的玩偶。

sentences.english: And everybody from jack-in-the-box to Wall Street is clamoring to get a piece of the action.
sentences.chinese: 从玩偶盒到华尔街，谁都想介入这个领域。
